snippet: The blast occurred in the Marja district of Helmand Province, a Taliban stronghold, killing at least 12 members of a family and wounding eight.
lead_paragraph: The blast occurred in the Marja district of Helmand Province, a Taliban stronghold, killing at least 12 members of a family and wounding eight.

headline.main: Roadside Bomb Kills at Least 12 Afghans on Their Way Home
headline.print_headline: Roadside Bomb Kills at Least 12 Afghans on Their Way Home
